data.title: The Crusader Oceanfront Resort, Located In Wildwood NJ
data.meta_description: The Crusader Oceanfront Family Resort in Wildwood Crest, NJ, offers the perfect place to stay on your next South Jersey family vacation.
data.text:
The Crusader Oceanfront Resort is located on the beachÂ in the heart ofÂ Wildwood Crest New Jersey, a top vacation destination as recently rated byÂ TripAdvisor.Our beachfront resort is situated on the cleanest, whitest expanse of beaches on the entire East Coast. The Crusader is alive with boundless opportunity for relaxation and family adventure as we offer shuffleboard, ping pong, and billiards onsite, with bike rentals, baseball fields, tennis & basketball courts all within a 10-minute walk. Enjoy the convenience of parking your vehicle here and walking with the family to the famed Â Wildwood BoardwalkÂ featuringÂ Moreys Amusement Piers and Water Parks.

Love Those Wildwood Days!

In season, let us do the cooking at our Crusader Coffee Shop serving breakfast and lunch daily. For those looking to prepare snacks and mini meals we also offer suites complete with kitchenettes to accommodate your needs. We look forward to doing everything possible to help make your Ëby-the-sea experience the best it can be. Reserve your vacation now and discover why TheÂ Crusader Resort has become a multi-generational classic and why theÂ Crusader ResortsÂ 50 plus years of traditionÂ ranks us as one of the top 15 beach resorts in Wildwood Crest. We look forward to serving you!Â Â Â The Hamlins and Domenicos, Owners
